name: Panzer Planet
description:
Cross through a hostile worlds.

After a crash, lost in a dark undated world, you will try to escape from a desolated industrial region. By controlling an armoured hovercraft, you will explore a series of lands and rooms, meet robots, find items, unlock doors ... ... with a single goal: finally be able to escape.

Dexterity and tenacity will be necessary for you to reach the end.

A working macOS and Linux build is on its way!
